manifest:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:versionCode="13" android:versionName="v0.6-beta-1" package="org.horaapps.leafpic" platformBuildVersionCode="24" platformBuildVersionName="7.0">
	<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="19" android:targetSdkVersion="24" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
	<uses-permission android:name="com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_SHORTCUT" />
	<uses-permission android:name="com.android.vending.BILLING" />
	<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.touchscreen" android:required="false" />
	<application android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a0110" android:label="LeafPic" android:icon="res/mipmap-mdpi-v4/ic_launcher.png" android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.MyApplication" android:allowBackup="true" android:largeHeap="true" android:supportsRtl="true">
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a011e" android:label="Video Player" android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.PlayerActivity" android:launchMode="singleInstance" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<data android:scheme="http" />
				<data android:scheme="https" />
				<data android:scheme="content" />
				<data android:scheme="asset" />
				<data android:scheme="file" />
				<data android:mimeType="video/*" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a011e" android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.SplashScreen" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.APP_GALLERY" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter android:label="LeafPic">
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.GET_CONTENT" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.OPENABLE" />
				<data android:mimeType="image/*" />
				<data android:mimeType="video/*" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter android:label="LeafPic">
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.PICK" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<data android:mimeType="image/*" />
				<data android:mimeType="video/*" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.horaapps.leafpic.OPEN_ALBUM" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a011e" android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.MainActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.albumsAct" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a011e" android:label="LeafPic" android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.SingleMediaActivity" android:configChanges="0x788" android:parentActivityName="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.MainActivity">
			<meta-data android:name="android.support.PARENT_ACTIVITY" android:value="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.MainActivity" />
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.albumPhoto" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<data android:mimeType="image/*" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="com.android.camera.action.REVIEW" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<data android:mimeType="image/*" />
				<data android:mimeType="video/*" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a011e" android:label="Settings" android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.SettingsActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.SETTING" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.APPLICATION_PREFERENCES" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a011e" android:label="About" android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.AboutActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.ABOUT" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a011e" android:label="Security" android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.SecurityActivity" android:configChanges="0x480">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.SECURITY" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a011e" android:label="Donate" android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.DonateActivity">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.DONATE" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a011e" android:label="Excluded Items" android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.activities.ExcludedAlbumsActivity">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.ExcludedAlbums" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f0a011e" android:name="com.yalantis.ucrop.UCropActivity" android:screenOrientation="portrait" />
		<meta-data android:name="org.horaapps.leafpic.CustomGlideModule" android:value="GlideModule" />
		<provider android:name="android.support.v4.content.FileProvider" android:exported="false" android:authorities="org.horaapps.leafpic.provider" android:grantUriPermissions="true">
			<meta-data android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS" android:resource="res/xml/provider_paths.xml" />
		</provider>
	</application>
</manifest>
